Name: Allient Inc.
Description: Allient Inc. (Ticker: ALNT) is a prominent provider of cutting-edge specialty chemicals and advanced materials, serving diverse sectors such as automotive, aerospace, and electronics. The company is dedicated to sustainability and innovation, creating high-performance solutions that not only enhance efficiency but also minimize environmental impact. Leveraging its strong research and development capabilities, Allient remains at the forefront of technological advancements, reinforcing its competitive edge. By fostering strategic partnerships and harnessing a skilled workforce, Allient is well-positioned to drive growth, deliver shareholder value, and positively impact the global economy.
Address: 495 COMMERCE DRIVE, AMHERST, NY, UNITED STATES, 14228-2313
